text:
Precision Nutrition | Full Stack Rails / Ember Developer | Remote

Precision Nutrition helps people transform their lives through expert coaching, ongoing support, and guided mentorship. Our team builds and supports tools for our coaches and clients to help facilitate transformative change and learning. Tech stack: Ember.js, Ruby/Rails, Postgresql, Some Elixir/Phoenix

Our whole company is remote.. and we're awesome :)

We're looking for a Data Engineer and a Full Stack Developer.

https://www.precisionnutrition.com/developer and https://precisionnutrition.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=14
